-- This script removes the UNIQUE constraints from the name_bn and name_ar columns
-- in the madrasas table to allow multiple madrasas to have the same name.
-- Note: The constraint names 'madrasas_name_bn_key' and 'madrasas_name_ar_key' are
-- the default names generated by PostgreSQL. If you have custom names,
-- you will need to replace them accordingly. You can find the exact name by running
-- `\d madrasas` in psql or checking the table definition in the Supabase dashboard.

ALTER TABLE public.madrasas DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS madrasas_name_bn_key;
ALTER TABLE public.madrasas DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS madrasas_name_ar_key;
